title: Bug 104630 - Column icons not visible when connecting to Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database in the application, the column icons are not being displayed. This issue is affecting the overall user experience when working with the database.
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not visible in the application.
EB: The column icons should be visible when connecting to a Derby database in the application.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Launch the application.
2. Connect to a Derby database.
3. Navigate to the table/view that contains columns.
4. Check if the column icons are visible. If not, observe the issue.
